sense.gloss: restoration to life, coming to life again, resuscitation, regeneration
playback, regeneration (of video or sound), views (of an online video)
regeneration (of lost or damage tissue), regrowth

sdata.j: 「トム、おはよう。どうしたの？↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑来↑↓く↓るの↑早↑↓はや↓いね」「うん。↑早↑↓はや↓く↑目↑↓め↓が↑覚↑↓さ↓めたから、↑来↑↓き↓てみた」「ふぅん。そうなんだ。それはそうとして、↑今日↑↓きょう↓の↑１↑↓いち↓↑限↑↓げん↓↑目↑↓め↓の↑国際↑↓こく|さい↓↑政治↑↓せい|じ↓↑論↑↓ろん↓って、↑休講↑↓きゅうこう↓だって↑知↑↓し↓ってる？」「えっ！！」
sdata.e: Morning, Tom. You're here early. What's up? "I woke up early, so I just came." "Ah. Well, did you know that first period International Politics is cancelled today?" "What?"
